_sText:
First of all sorry for change the name again, I think that it's better to know where are the LOTR themed maps (i'm doing anothers ze_LOTR_...). 

<object width="300"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/EmXbGHEbgIM&hl=es&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/EmXbGHEbgIM&hl=es&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="300"></embed></object>

NEW FIXES VERSION 4.5
- Staffs fixed (sometimes they didn't work)
- Color correction for better illumination (pics are from v4_3)
- 'The zombies have been alerted' bug fixed
- NO KILLING Balrog , AFKs or Campers will be teleported to jails, CT will be unarmed. For servers with zspawn.

NEW FIXES VERSION 4.3
- Bouncing physics problem
- Side noobs problem at Balin's tomb


NEW FIXES VERSION 4.2
- Circle fix: zombies can't jump in.
- Little fixes: stuck bugs, elevator.
- Wooden planks at stairs zone fixed.
- No Balrog zones fixed. Balrog at superior stairs fixed.
- And some balance changes:
   · Saruman staff hurts 70 dmg per second during 5 s (the first purpose will be slow zombies).
   · Difficult of some parts changed (at 4_1, some parts are boring):
      - Balin's tomb: less props, the door is weaker.
      - Pillar zone: the last hole will open in 1.5 s, not in 2.5. The falling pillar will fall in 1s, not in 2.5s.
      - Stairs: all the crates will break when the stairs start moving.
      - Khazad-Dum bridge: the fall won't hurt for zombies (the fall injured 300 of hp)

NEW FIXES VERSION 4.1

- Unbalance problems fixed:
   · More damage for Saruman staff: 700 per second (before 300).
   · More range for both staffs.
   · Door only closes 1 time (10 seconds to close).
   · 2 Seconds barrier for zombies at spiral stairs
   · Zombies can't jump directly to Balin's tomb exit.
   · The barriers at pilar zone break at 2.5 s ( not at 0s)
   · The falling floor will break only for zombies (and it's bigger)
   · The falling column takes 3s to start moving (not 0s)
   · More light at stairs zone.
   · Ramp for CTs for jump the crates easily (this ramp will break with zombies coming).
   · Bigger teleport area for stucked people.
   · Khazad Dum bridge is more thin and long, and CTs have a near point to protect gandalf.

--------------------------------------------------
NEW FIXES/FEATURES VERSION 3.1 

- Stuck bug of staffs fixed.
- Saruman staff hurts more (300 per second , before 220 per second).
- Some visual bug fixed.
- Pr0 jumping bugs fixed (circle and stairs).
- Random ring position.
- Moving stair fixed (tele for the stucked people)

-----------------------------------------------

NEW FIXES/FEATURES VERSION 3
- I didn't remove the black floor (area portal), I tested and add 15-20 more fps playing online.
- Bad displacements fix
- Bad texturing fix
- Teleport bug at the lift fixed
- The falling column will break at 20s
- The falling wall will break at 7s
- More crates to defend at last stairs.
- The flying zombies at the circle will be stopped.
- Bunny jump at stairs will fixed; falling zombies won't get hurt with the fall.
- More advises for the zombies that don't read the console.
- Stuck problem at lift. No nuke zone bug fixed.
- Elevator fix.
- Optimization with nodraw textures.
- Ring placed at top of ladders.
- Improved ring
- Gandalf staff item (hability: push zombies and props).
- Saruman staff item (hability: hurt near zombies).
- Random probability of the staffs access (28% no staff, 28% Gandalf only, 28% Saruman only, 14% both staffs)
- More custom sounds

-----------------------------------------------

NEW FIXES/FEATURES VERSION 2_2
- Displacement surfing bug at stairs.
- The falling column will break(for stucked people).
- Circle pushing bug
- Gandalf scene is now working

-----------------------------------------------

NEW FIXES/FEATURES VERSION 2_1
- 100% bug fixing (included stuck problems).
- FPS fix: I deleted many lights (and increased the brigthness), changed prop properties (no shadows), put a portal_vis at the spiral stair, and deleted some useless props. Cave: 6 ->2 lights. Entrance to ladder zone: 8->2. Ladder zone: 4 ->2. Espiral stair: 10->1 etc..
- Ladder barriers fixed
- The fallen wall at Balin is now breakable (for the poor people that get stuck).
- Columns zone is now darker and have less lights.
- Some access bugs.
- The stairs: more brightness; its easier throw the zombies; no teleport if you fall; two crates to protect the people that don't jump; the moving stair now flat (I hope that the people will not stuck)
- Gandalf final scene fixed: now if he dies the song starts instantly. It's easier to protect Gandalf.
- Camper cleaning: 'Balrog' will clean every zone, if someone reach the end of a zone, in 1:30 minutes this will be cleaned.
- The ring carrier: a shiny deagle with a floating ring can be taken at start zone, if the ring reaches the Khazad-Dum bridge, the wooden bridge will break, and will be easier to protect Gandalf (the ring carrier must drop it to the ground, after crossing the bridge). If a ring carrier is gonna die, he should throw the ring to another human. The ring can be dropped and picked at any time.
- For much more FPS, the flashlight is now disabled (in every map the flashlight drops a lot of fps).

----------------------------------------------

Some features of this map:
- Map length: 6:30 minutes
- Max players: 64
- Custom music
- AFK clean
- Camper clean
- Anti-Stuck
- High optimized

-----------------------------------------------

Map structure:
- The lake: the start zone, the entrance/door of the Mines of Moria.
- First passage: a short corridor.
- Cave zone: a big hall full of ways that appears at the movie.
- Ladders: climb and arrive to the three doors and descent to the Balin's tomb.
- Balin's tomb: humans must resist 40s, while zombies try to get in, breaking the door.
- Escape through the columns: leave Balin's tomb and run until reach the protection circle.
- The stairs: try to jump or stay until the rock fall.
- Khazad-Dum bridge: reach the bridge; one human must stay in the middle of the bridge, and their partners must protect him.
- Escape from Moria: if 'Gandalf' breaks the bridge, you will be able to escape from Moria.

-----------------------------------------------

WARNING!!!!!!!: This map is optimized for zombie servers:
- With no-blocking.
- Without prop menu.

UPDATES VERSION 5_1
- NO CRASH AT MAP LOAD

UPDATES VERSION 5
- FIX FOR NEW ENGINE (cs source update) (the Ring works, Balin's tomb doors dont close in front of humans)
- Improved illumination.
- Balance: improved barricade at stairs zone
- Bug fix: zombies without weapons fix
- Faster AFK/camper clean



---------------------------------------------


Some features of this map:
- Map length: 6:30 minutes
- Max players: 64
- Custom music
- AFK clean
- Camper clean
- Anti-Stuck
- High optimized

-----------------------------------------------

Map structure:
- The lake: the start zone, the entrance/door of the Mines of Moria.
- First passage: a short corridor.
- Cave zone: a big hall full of ways that appears at the movie.
- Ladders: climb and arrive to the three doors and descent to the Balin's tomb.
- Balin's tomb: humans must resist 40s, while zombies try to get in, breaking the door.
- Escape through the columns: leave Balin's tomb and run until reach the protection circle.
- The stairs: try to jump or stay until the rock fall.
- Khazad-Dum bridge: reach the bridge; one human must stay in the middle of the bridge, and their partners must protect him.
- Escape from Moria: if 'Gandalf' breaks the bridge, you will be able to escape from Moria.

-----------------------------------------------

WARNING!!!!!!!: This map is optimized for zombie servers:
- With escape config.
- With no-blocking.
- Without prop menu.
- With reloading weapons.

-----------------------------------------------

NEW FIXES/FEATURES VERSION 2_1
- 100% bug fixing (included stuck problems).
- FPS fix: I deleted many lights (and increased the brigthness), changed prop properties (no shadows), put a portal_vis at the spiral stair, and deleted some useless props. Cave: 6 ->2 lights. Entrance to ladder zone: 8->2. Ladder zone: 4 ->2. Espiral stair: 10->1 etc..
- Ladder barriers fixed
- The fallen wall at Balin is now breakable (for the poor people that get stuck).
- Columns zone is now darker and have less lights.
- Some access bugs.
- The stairs: more brightness; its easier throw the zombies; no teleport if you fall; two crates to protect the people that don't jump; the moving stair now flat (I hope that the people will not stuck)
- Gandalf final scene fixed: now if he dies the song starts instantly. It's easier to protect Gandalf.
- Camper cleaning: 'Balrog' will clean every zone, if someone reach the end of a zone, in 1:30 minutes this will be cleaned.
- The ring carrier: a shiny deagle with a floating ring can be taken at start zone, if the ring reaches the Khazad-Dum bridge, the wooden bridge will break, and will be easier to protect Gandalf (the ring carrier must drop it to the ground, after crossing the bridge). If a ring carrier is gonna die, he should throw the ring to another human. The ring can be dropped and picked at any time.
- For much more FPS, the flashlight is now disabled (in every map the flashlight drops a lot of fps).

-----------------------------------------------

NEW FIXES/FEATURES VERSION 2_2
- Displacement surfing bug at stairs.
- The falling column will break(for stucked people).
- Circle pushing bug
- Gandalf scene is now working

-----------------------------------------------

NEW FIXES/FEATURES VERSION 3
- I didn't remove the black floor (area portal), I tested and add 15-20 more fps playing online.
- Bad displacements fix
- Bad texturing fix
- Teleport bug at the lift fixed
- The falling column will break at 20s
- The falling wall will break at 7s
- More crates to defend at last stairs.
- The flying zombies at the circle will be stopped.
- Bunny jump at stairs will fixed; falling zombies won't get hurt with the fall.
- More advises for the zombies that don't read the console.
- Stuck problem at lift. No nuke zone bug fixed.
- Elevator fix.
- Optimization with nodraw textures.
- Ring placed at top of ladders.
- Improved ring
- Gandalf staff item (hability: push zombies and props).
- Saruman staff item (hability: hurt near zombies).
- Random probability of the staffs access (28% no staff, 28% Gandalf only, 28% Saruman only, 14% both staffs)

--------------------------------------------------
NEW FIXES/FEATURES VERSION 3.1 (LAST VERSION: the map now calls ze_the_Mines_of_Moria)

- Stuck bug of staffs fixed.
- Saruman staff hurts more (300 per second , before 220 per second).
- Some visual bug fixed.
- Pr0 jumping bugs fixed (circle and stairs).
- Random ring position.
- Moving stair fixed (tele for the stucked people)

Changes of v3\_3
Many changes to improve gameplay, bug fix and exploits.
Important fix: bouncy physics glitch doesn't seem to be fixed but it may happens with less frequency..
The map has been improved considerably.
For more info, go to http://rafuron.wordpress.com. This is the last map of the ZE LOTR map serie. Changes of v2_2 and v2\_1
- Spawn gates open 5 seconds later
- Added zombie config commands
- Respawn of 2s at extreme and 25s at normal
- Horses at stage 1 are unblockable
- Stage 2 orange door opens 3 seconds later
- Catapult rock of stage 3 is unblockable (the one that breaks the door)
- Lift goes faster at stage 4
- Balrog can't jump a lot.
- Torches push trigger are only enabled at pick up.
- The stage and difficulty system works even if the physics crash.
- Warm up round is not 60 seconds instead 120.
- White Knight don't freeze another human
- Spawn portals are only for zombies now
- The item horse can't screw the round at stage 1 nazgul part.
- Modified the last defense spot of stage 4, now there is another way for CT to get in)
- Deleted the ladder item
- CT can't win stage 4 if they are dead (zombified at last second)
- Oil item now has a trigger\_hurt that ignites repeatedly and hurts.
- Stage 3 first part doors break automatically
- Hidders of stage 4 bottom part (before stairs) will be killed 30 seconds earlier.
- Stage 4 ghost army arrival 15 seconds earlier.
- Up to 3 trolls at same round. If a troll dies, you can pick up another.
- More push for torches
- Stage 1 ending bugged why nazguls that passes the gates fixed.
- Meteor falls 0.5 later.
- Flying balrog at stage 4 fixed.
- Soldiers hp goes from 45 yo 55 hp. If you are zombie and you touch it, you will damage it 1 of HP. Hordes of zombies touching them at same time will insta kill the soldiers.
- Balrog is not 5% faster
- Troll HP from 12k to 8k (body) and 7.5k to 4k (face)
- White Knight damages half (there was a bug at v2 where he double damages)
- Closer teleport for zombies at last part of stage 4.
- If you are lvl 0 at extreme, you will level up to 1 automatically.
- Flame of oil will not light if you are out of the black room.
- Meteor falls from 8s to 10s. Damages from 500 to 80 of hp.

### 29.06 Mini Fixed 
1.Game text thanks for the help Battler

2.The waiting time at 1 stage is corrected
21.06 Fixed
-----------
Optimized a map as t has turned out.
A little the new has added.
Thanks huge Kaemon for its help.
glhf.

UPDATES V5
- All bugs fixed (knife boosting, crash ladders)
- Few things improved.
- V5 = FINAL version

UPDATES V4_1
- Torch works now
- Force zombie spawn from 5 to 10 seconds

UPDATES V4
- FIXED FOR NEW ENGINE(cs source update) (the torch works now)
- Balance: battering ram is more powerful
- Balance: barricades at castle are more effective
- Force zombie spawn from 5 to 15 seconds.
- New explosion effect (by source engine 2009)

UPDATES V3
- Minor bug fix: last charge obstruct coz the gate tables
- Bug exploit (boost zombies to the secret passage at castle) fixed.
- New way between two of the spawn zones.
- Battering ram is more powerful.

Resume video:

UPDATES V3_2
- Bug fix (people getting in mountains, invisible prop at charge, stuck, etc).
- Final hall with static barrier.
- Less defending time at forth (40s no 50s)
- Small barricade near the small door of forth.
- The shiny points (of the retreat) will appear only when the fort doors are open.
- The gate will be break easily with the battering ram.
- No teleport zone at last charge.


UPDATES V3_1
- Balance adjustments
- No crash problem
- Bugs fix

UPDATES V2_3L
- A lot of adjustments (balance problems)
- Optimization
- Crash problem
- Zombie block problem (server with 25 s of zombie spawn)


WARNING: this map is ready for :
- Servers with 1º zombify time between 0 and 25 s (more than 25 will generate weird and bad rounds).
- Servers without unlimited ammo (the ladders will break sooner, much more easy)
- Servers no block.



LOTR scenery------
Fangorn and Helms Deep outdoors.

History------------
Same as the film, humans must reach Helms Deep and fight against the orcs and their weapons and items.

How to win (as human)---------
Escape from Fangorn forest, reach the Helms Deep, defend at the walls or at the main door as much as you can; if the main door breaks, people at wall must retrieve to the fort, if zombies pass the wall, the main door will break in 40s; before one of these events, CT must defend the first level during 30 s before get in the fort (2º level), where they need to defend during 40s; after this,they must go into the hall, defend during 20 s, and then charge against the zombies to escape from Helms Deep.

How to win (as zombie)--------
When night falls, you can attack the wall or the door:
- The main door: you can break it with knife, and try to get in, or wait until the ram to break the door easily (you need to stay near the ram to move it). At more than 1:30 minutes, you can use the huge stair to get at the fort.
- The walls: siege the walls; use the stairs to climb the wall and try to kill CT; at more than 1:30 minutes, you can catch the torch, and explode the wall.

Special features-----------
· Day and night fight.
· Zombies have 500 hp regen every 10 s (they are zombie Uruk-Hai ).
· AFK and people out of Helms Deep will be forced to be zombies.
· The torch will expire in 25s; then will appear another torch.
· The ladders are breakable, you can pull the ladders.
· Optional barricade: some static barricades can be activated with +use button.
· LOTR scenes:
- Aragorn and Gimli: jump as human to the bridge and pull the zombies.
- Legolas shoot: the only way to pull the huge stair, is shooting at the rope, you have 0.5 s to shoot a little point.
- Final charge: you must follow the shiny path to push away the zombies.
· 2 secret items.
In my map, there is not bug !!! Nuke !!! Go escape, you are lost... good luck !!! my map is in Night !
A nice winter zombie escape map.

Xmas Licciana

 Xmas Licciana is a christmas rework of the famous ze licciana escape.
Gargantua is aware of this version and allowed me to rework his map.
The map got no big gameplay changes.
Old and known bugs/glitches got fixed.

Features
  • Overall Christmas-Theme Rework
  • Classic Xmas Background Music + Music Room
  • Easter Eggs
  • Map Santa Skins

Special Thanks
  • Moltard for helping me creating this map.
  • GARGANTUA for giving his permission.
  • I3D CSS Community for testservers and helpful feedback.

ZE_LICCIANA - By ROGER GARGANTUA

UPDATED: ze_licciana_escape_v2 !! 
- New alternative way at spawn
- fixed secret lift 

The sequal map of Sorrento_escape. After your spectacular escape from Sorrento you and the rest of the survivors arrive at the dangerous hunting lands of Licciana. Only way to survive is to find the legendary village Licciana.

Features:
* Special 3d-skybox with lots of pretty views. It even has ze_sorrento_escape in a far distance
* Lots of unique traps
* 64 spawnplaces
* Working Nuke explosion
* Secret ways
* Grenade building ( as in every map I made )
* Alternative ways


Credits: 
- Masen ( maptester )
- Krassell ( my Hammer mapping friend and feedback )
- i3d.net (For their big support and they have the best ZombieMod servers) 
- Big thanks to the people who love my maps including my SteamFriends & i3D Admins! 

++ GARGANTUA ++

my first zombie-escape map

- 60 spawns ( i think less are better )
- after some time there is an afk-kill in the spawning area
- im sorry, it has no real theme
- no secrets
- fps: 60-300 ; often around 200, but sometimes like in the spawning area there are only aroung 60 fps or more
- you spawn outside (pic1), then you can choose from two different ways, while you have to wait for different doors to open, and at the end you have to defend the "escape-boat" - area and finally there is a nuke, which kills all players except the people on the boats.

#UPDATE: 

Just edited the map, If you downloaded before the (Modified Date) Please re-download.

Also, Please don't try to find anything to change unless it's a bug that will make the map not work the way it was suppose to. I can't change anything more to the map ATM so anything modified will be in V2.
Thanks!
---------------------------------------------
FIXED: AFK killer into a teleporter for respawning zombies.

New Music

Changed map name to ze_lemonysnickets_v1 for Servers that had the map already

More Detail added

Changed some timers and such

Fixed couple bugs

NEW VERSION UPLOADED!
------------------




- Map starts with a hard climbing part, but I added a "noob" way on the top of the glass with a ladder and a holding spot.

- After first climb part there's 2 portals, each of them goes to a different stage.

- After this 2 stages there's a converging part where all ct's fight together again.

- On the final of this stage there's teleport for the boss arena, but there's 3 possible ends that are randomly chosen. The middle one is a boss fight and the other two are normal escapes.

- Also, there are 3 special weapons. (Cool'r and 2 builders).




Thanks to Enviolinador for the textures and for all the help he provided me.

Thank you for all the feedback provided in the other version.

V2:

- Fixed sound files, now you can turn music on/off by using options - audio - music volume.

- Added a 3D Skybox.

- Fixed bugs and changed some holding spots.


------------------

It's my first ze map, and pretty much the first "serious" map I make. Would appreciate any feedback.
Make your way from the spawn to the saferoom before the volcano erupts. Saferoom comes equipped with a security camera and screen.

**Story**
Zombie escape map based on a post-apocalyptic future where the last remains of the humanity will activate the final device for killing all zombies around the globe.

Four stages, four generators. The humans objective: activate all the generators and then defend the main core in the fifth stage.

**Description**
The map tries to keep the shape and gameplay of the classic maps:
- No mass teleports for force players to move ahead.
- No invisible walls.
- All ways are connected with no teleports.
- Wide paths
- Intense action due the lack of helps to the human team

The map, although, includes modern maps features:
- Human items (stages 2,4,5)
- Zombie items (stage 3,5)
- Stages system
- Extreme mode
- Player controlled boss
- Event system

**Event system**
Hidden and visible events may be triggered by players during the stages 1,2,3 and 4. These will alter the gameplay in the stage 5 and will determine how easy or difficult will be to defend the core and save the humanity.

**Extreme**
Extreme difficult will be enabled after stage 5 is completed.
Completing extreme difficulty will be considered completing the map at 100%

**Notice**
Map is still in development process and the balance may not be as good as I wanted.

_sText:

A really godawful map I tried to make in less than one day. Although the map itself was done in 6 hours, I overslept the two following days and didn't finish it, so I failed at the 1-day thing. I've probably spent 8-10 hours on it at most. 

The map features puzzles, music, 64-unit blocks for everything, awful mechanics and stupidity. Although I doubt it has -many- bugs it won't be too enjoyable probably. 

The first puzzle is basketball. You have to throw the dualies with the attached yellow block over the 'basket'. It is easy but needs some practice; as ZE players won't give a shit the map will probably end here with lots of rage and flying turds. You need to get the dualies into the basket twice.

Then a shitty bridge appears. It induces seizures, kinda, so it's better to wait until it fully opens. 

Then the typical press two buttons at the same time. The map needed more fillers.

After that, the retardation bridges come. They block your WASD control and make you move backwards always so you have to backpedal. You can only move your camera and jump (while on the air you can use WASD) to get past them.

There's a few holds and then a physics puzzle. Depending on how you solve it, one of the two possible endings will happen.

The map features:

- Lots of fog
- Unholdable holds, probably
- No special weapons because they're very expensive and the map is poor
- Dev textures because real textures are too complicated
- 64 spawns
- Music
- Radar to make the path more clear since it's a mess
- Awkward, horrid puzzles
- Lame, unfunny console commands
- The root of all evil

--------

I will not be updating the map probably as it is just terrible, but if the teleports are retarded or something it might happen. Post suggestions and whatever, but the basketball puzzle stays.

ze_Kebab_Immigrant_v3

Map made in 10 days for the Unloze Mapping Contest.

It's a sweet map with only 1 long stage.

There are 5 items for CT, 1 mini-boss and 1 big boss.

The map need a good teamwork and defend but it's not really hard when you know it.

I hope you will enjoy playing it.

A Zombie Escape map based on the movie "Jurassic Park" that following the story

Spec :

- 64 players
- afk teleport
- cubemap
- particle
- 2 weapons
- 3 differents way to finish
- day/night

V1 modifications :

- fix door opening for zombies
- fix little glich that allow to zombies to keep 50 000 hp if they don't pass the door
- fix opening of the second door of the bunker
- new bunker design
- new helicopter to avoid lag
- modification of starting crate to avoid lag
- new decoration of controle room
- removing the teleporter after the brigde and replace by clip
- zombies can't climb to the tree anymore, they should climb the hill and there is rocks and tree to slow them
- new rail detail
- moving the WC next to the T-rex attack
- new stairs in the main room of the visitor center
- timming adjustements
- plank in the t-rex paddock no longer blok you (no more jumping necessary)
- add a vent next to the control room
- more console messages
- (new screenshots)

V_0_9 modifications :

- more zombies fights
- modification of the bunker and dock ending
- modification of helicopter timming
- optimisation (i've gain 15 min of compilation)
- reduction of the entities
- vending machines replace by fix vending to avoid fail nades and because zombies can passe thru it.
- modification of the door opening of the visitor center and timming of the jeep
- modification of the tour cars timming to avoid CT die by the doors
- weapons are more easy to take
- fixing trunk fall, and WC bloking door
- some new decoration at different places

V_0_8 modifications :

- fix the huge lag on new round start (server crash in some case)
- some little adjustements of timming

V_0_7 modifications :

- doors fix !
- start totally modify
- one new ending
- 2 others endings modify
- more automatique triggers (no more button to press to call the boad and the chopper)
- modifications of timings and add some defense spot
- more help in the bunker
- jeep at the end will no more block the players (teleporter attach in front of the jeeps)
- fix afk teleport
- some help to avoid to die with the high tree (teleport + water)
- fix some ways where you should crouch to pass

V_0_6 modifications :

- crash fix !
- ladder fix in t-rex fence
- more console messages to explain where to go
- some light to show the way or to show where are important buttons
- more car speed
- some help for zombies for door to break

This is an updated version of ze_jurassicpark_v2 to work on the latest version of CS:S. It had stopped working after the update so people had requested a fix.

Changelog (v2_1):
- Added hold point at truck area
- Added ladders on fence (must disable power to use)
- Added alternate truck path (must destroy the car)
- Added Raptor nest
- Removed Stegosaurus 
- Changed final hold point area and increased helicopter wait time
- Optimized map so that it uses 100-200 IN instead of 1500 IN (less lag)

Changelog (v2_6):
- Improved Visuals
- Increased difficulty for humans
- Added secret for zombies
- Truck changed to a bus
- Changed hold times / barrier strength
- Completely re-made displacements
- Added spawn hold barrier (to stop zombies)

Changelog (v2_7):
- Fixed players getting stuck again
- Added night mode
- Fixed invisible players glitch
- Fixed "drifting" bus

V2 update:

1. FREAKIN' DINOSAURS RAWRR!!!!!

I've added a select few of the island's classic inhabitants. They come with custom animations. All thanks to yellowoboe for the models (I cannot verify his part completely in the creation) Please check out his work here! http://www.garrysmod.org/downloads/?a=view&id=5925 

2. Added more planks for alternate routes.

3. Easily breakable blanks / sign to help keep zombies off your back.

4. 64 player support.

Isla Nublar, 02:00 Zulu - 1993

The Biosyn Corporation has long had a particular interest in the development of live embryos owned by John Hammond's InGen. Although prehistoric DNA extraction has widely been known for nearly a decade, the incubation of live specimen via amphibian host material has been a closely guarded secret.

Weeks after the Jurassic Park incident Biosyn has sent a team of private contractors to retrieve the lost embryo canister that the late Dennis Nedry has failed to provide. You are a member of the expedition. Although you came to Nublar for a large profit, you now flee in terror for your own survival. Your team has been ambushed by territorial Velociraptor (antirrhopus nublarensis), and is now being stalked by the deadly predators. You can hear their distinguished shrills in the distance. The east docks have become your only salvation.

Now is the time to run.

Map by: Butterknife aka Jaekto
Texture support: Japetheape
Prefabs: ATIX & JJ45

Hey all!
========
**Credits:**
============
First i want to say that, i'm not the original author of this map. Original author is _Butterknife_, i just remade and fixed this map :)
**Story**
=========
After huge update, what broke jurassicpark, i heard that Butterknife quit mapping and hes not going to fix it :( First i was very unhappy, cuz i rly liked jurassicpark and first i was trying to find a proper fixed version of it... but like you all might now, there aren't any good fixed versions.
After some thinking, decided to fix it myself. First i decompiled the latest version of this map and i have to say it was so badly broken... leaks, overlapping textures, overlapping objects, wierd looking and stretched displacements etc. So, the only way was to completely remake this map. First i made some plans on paper, took some measurements and started mapping. It took me 8th versions to get this so far as it is :) (4beta versions + 4final versions) 
Testing took place in I3d zombie escape server (213.163.68.179:27015)
I hope you all enjoy this map!! 
===============================
If you find any mistakes, bugs, then please tell me :)

After a while i finnaly release v1_2 of jungle escape. Changes consist of fixing teleport glitches in stage 2 and generally just making stage 2 more playable. 

The map contains 4 stages, a custom player model for humans, 5 items for humans and 1 item for zombies. There are also some particles and music. Enjoy the Abstract jungle

ze isla nublar v2_1
==================

v2_1 Fixes
--------

- trigger push to stop zombies from knifing under the helicopter
- moved a teleport exit to avoid teleport spam
- fixed zombie healer from teleporting instead of healing
- normal mode more easy

v2 Fixes
--------

- random teleport glitches fixed
- hard mode more harder

v1fix Fixes
--------

- added missing helicopter propeller textures

v1 Fixes
--------

- added a new spawn area
- shotgun/medic kit can't be spammed
- fixed shotgun ammo
- moved medic kit spawn
- extreme ending more easy
- helicopter rotors fixed
- cube maps (shiny surfaces)
- better fps in lobby/boss fight area.
- new path into the roof for zombies
- some doors for zombies now break, so those behind the group can catch up
- added a table at a hold point
- crates in the cafe now break on extreme
- trex moon walk now happens alot less.
- fixed a bug where ct could win with zombies in the copter

b2 Fixes
--------

- fixed invisible boxes and other items not showing gltich
- added button so admin can change the level
- fixed the tele on hard mode so afk's and respawns will go into raptor pen and not respawn in the complex
- zombies now heal when in the raptor pen
- added timer on the trex battle
- reduced trex hp
- added medic kit
- adjusted heli paths

b1_5 Fixes
--------

- compile time now down to 6mins
- bsp size reduced (.bsp=80mb) (.bz2=41mb)
- reduced the amount of phys objects in map
- removed area portal windows
- removed some breakables
- changed normal hold at the end
- new improved clipping, to reduce chance of zombie fail nade
- minor spawn changes
- trex trigger_hurt now larger radius
- fixed water outside of visitors center


b1 Fixes
--------

- removed secret teleport
- re-worked level system
- optimization (compile from 18mins to 9mins)
- added new helicopter (black hawk)
- more trex hp
- last ending rocks light glitch is fixed
- removed area portals from outisde
- increased far z plane for more fps
- more level brushes/displacments are now 3d skybox
- normal ending roof area optimized (player should get 25-100 more fps here than before)

a4 Fixes
--------

- crash fix update (crash should be now fixed, if not please report)
- trex health added
- route time adjustment
- prop adjustment
- predator texture added
- some minor detail changes
- secret changed
- added some he nades in more secret places
- added another shotgun in the most secret route (hard extreme only)

a3 Fixes
--------

- zombies can get under the gate at raptor pen
- improved cliping in places
- rotated a crate at a defend spot
- secret way teleport is now allowed for only ct
- added a new camp spot at the raptor pen
- improved timing of extreme helicopter
- added some more HP to t-rex
- doors dont block or stick players on extreme mode
- changed a texture or two
- fixed non working helicopter blades on some rounds

a2 Fixes
--------

- crash is now fixed (not 100% though until tested)
- double wooded doors dont kill you
- normal differcultie helicopter comes in faster
- delayed control room glass break time
- ending of extreme completely changed (now is like the novel)
- doors at spawn break faster
- some minor detail changes
- t-rex increased HP (only fair match if server has regular clip)
- improved 3d skybox
- displacment value reduced in some places
- removed 1 route for normal only (less camper)
- player can no longer live the fall over the pen
- fail nade zombie up to trigger "lose_trigger" is now almost impossible
- added boxes and table for defence
- more console messages


Features
--------

- Normal,hard and extreme modes
- trex boss fight
- different endings
- 3d skybox
- usable spas12 shot gun and medic kit
- 64 spawns
- custom models, sounds, textures and music
- cube maps


Please leave feedback on any bugs and improvements, thanks.

ze_infiltration version 3.0 (FINAL)

Map made by: Per30010 - Luffaren (same person) Youtube: Per30010 Fpsbanana: Per30010 Steamnick: Luffaren add me: per_r94

Installation instructions

...open cstrike/maps and extract all files to "C:/program/steam/steamapps/"steamnick"/counter-strike:source/cstrike/maps" Start/restart Cs:s and type "map ze_inflitration" in the console or just create a server.

Map description

  • 64 players

  • Cubemapped

  • 5 different spawns

  • Size of map - Large

  • music - (Halo by bungie)

  • Soundscaped

  • particle systems

  • 3d skybox

  • Secrets

  • Helicopter

  • Tram

  • Elevators

UPDATE V.2.0

  • Added trigger_hurt in the secret area

  • Fixed a bug when the same music could play twice

  • Added another smaller secret (not an area)

  • Added crane platform in the crane room

  • Fixed the elevator to go faster and move down the ladder another floor

  • Fixed texture problems

  • Fixed filesize by converting the .wav files to .Mp3 files (thanks kaemon) :)

  • shortened the map to go a little bit faster due to mp_roundtime 9 (if it still isnt fixed, please give me some feedback what i can shorten up)

  • Added a very very small amount of detail

UPDATE V.3.0 (FINAL)

  • Fixed all the texture issues

  • Changed the helicopter route

  • Speeded up the helicopter

  • Fixed some timing issues

  • Changed the vortex

  • !Secret!

  • Fixed an issue when players could block the tram

  • Imported an voiceover from the movie predator

  • Fixed an issue when zombies got stuck in a trap

  • Made more console messages for less confusion

  • Fixed an issue when players could jump on a fence and get knifed by zombies

  • Changed a secret

  • Made an extra effect at the end. The platform that sticks out falls after the helicopter goes by it.

  • Changed music timing a bit

Notes

if there is any issues please contact me, i will fix them in the next version. PLEASE ADD THIS MAP TO YOUR SERVER, it would be much appriceated ;D

Update v.3.0 (final)!

This is it! The final version of ze_infiltration Download it, upload it to your server and play it!

Thank you all!

Special thanks

Tophattwaffle - he taught me some good stuff. Valve - for making Cs:s, U ROCK VALVE! Bungie - for the soundtracks of awesomeness. Love bungie! Kaemon - for giving me great feedback and support! Sandfly - for giving me huge support (sent me the voiceover etc)! He also gave me a huge step into the mapping community!

HAVE FUN!

**Get a video tour of the map:**

<iframe width="420" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/wquUm70iGXs" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

---------------
Story & Setting
---------------

Greetings Soldier,

You and the rest of your squad have been dispatched to Rome, Italy, to recover what's left of the capital's IMX (Immunity Med-X). Sources have reported a large quanity of the drug in the Nuclear Station located 500 ft below the city's main industrial zone. Gain access to the facility and recover what you can. Evac will report at 2200 on the eastern city limits. 

Good luck. Over and out.

--------------
Creator's Note
--------------

This map took over 60 hours in production, so please do leave some feedback and constructive criticism, as well as any problems you are having with the map!

It has been created as part of the SG Mapping competition, which you can find here: [http://www.steamgamers.com/forum/community-announcements/52849-mapping-competition.html](http://www.steamgamers.com/forum/community-announcements/52849-mapping-competition.html "http://www.steamgamers.com/forum/community-announcements/52849-mapping-competition.html")

Also, a **BIG** thank you to The Fifth Horseman, who composed and recorded one of the tracks you will hear in the map. Check them out on Facebook: [http://www.facebook.com/TheFifthHorsemanUK](http://www.facebook.com/TheFifthHorsemanUK "http://www.facebook.com/TheFifthHorsemanUK")

----------------
General Features
----------------

- Heavy Metal composed FOR the map by a UK Band!
- 64 spawn points
- A variety of secrets (Including dat disco!)
- 9 minutes of run-time

------------------
Technical Features
------------------

- Cubemaps
- Soundscapes
- Optimization
- Color Correction
- Custom Skybox
- Zombie: Reloaded CFG (Map Specific Mod Configuration)

------------------
Known Bugs:
------------------
- Cubemap error resulting in weird concrete in the final area.

This is my first ZE map, which I made from scratch taking ideas from here and there.

There are three different routes which contain different spots to hold and traps, and that lead to the same place: A bridge and then the lab. From the lab you'll be sent to the lower levels of the building and you'll have to go to the old train station to activate the train and escape. You will have to hold the train for 75 seconds, so you'd better prepare well.

This map is a typical Zombie Escape map with lots of places where you have to resist and some secrets, including a code-protected door and a rocket launcher.

To make gameplay easier, some console messages will tell you what to do, but basically you have to leave in a train before a missile is launched (As in most escape maps)

Have fun!
